title: JSON-Schema Example Profile
description: This profile is an example of how to use the JSON Schema wihin the Jamf Pro Custom Application Settings in a managed distribution configuration workflow.

keyNameStringWithOptions.title: This String with Options
keyNameStringWithOptions.description: Choose your value from a predefined list of options

keyNameInteger.title: This Number
keyNameInteger.description: You may enter a number here, the default is 0

keyNameIntegerWithOptions.title: This Number with Options
keyNameIntegerWithOptions.description: This number is an array of choices with titles. Each option maps to a value. The default is 0

keyNameArray.title: This Array
keyNameArray.description: This is an array example. You may populate items in a list using this key type.

keyNameBoolean.title: This Boolean
keyNameBoolean.description: This boolean is true or false. The default is false.

keyNameArrayWithDictionaries.title: This array with sub-dictionairies
keyNameArrayWithDictionaries.description: This array creates a dictionary of strings and allows to select integers or boolean values.
